common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Returns affiliates that are saved to managed affiliate list
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The start index of request.

The max managed affiliates of affiliate is 2000. Zero count will returned if offset > 2000 or offset > real managed count.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"iXSKndM"},{"description":"

The number of affiliate returned by this request, Max is 100, default is 20.

The max managed affiliates of affiliate is 2000. 

","name":"page_size","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"WfHxWhk"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"sttRSGy"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fhZXjKi"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"AyXKyPn"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"xmWrMNj","children":[{"description":"

The total count of affiliates that managed by this seller.

","name":"total_count","sample":"1000","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"bnPbHii"},{"description":"

Affiliate list managed by seller.

Not all return fields will have values.

","name":"affiliate_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"scFfYye","children":[{"description":"

The unique key for the current affiliate.

","name":"affiliate_id","sample":"12345678","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"SpkNjFY"},{"description":"

The name of the current commission.

","name":"affiliate_name","sample":"affiliate a","type":"string","required":null,"key":"cBdydBY"},{"description":"

The shopee user name or affiliate name for this affiliate

","name":"user_name","sample":"ss","type":"string","required":null,"key":"aWTacGF"},{"description":"

The portrait url of affiliate.

","name":"portrait_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"eParhtS"},{"description":"

The popular social media of this affiliate.

","name":"popular_social_media","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"bjrNMnf","children":[{"description":"

The platform of this social media account. 

","name":"platform","sample":"meta","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YhDXcfn"},{"description":"

The follower count of this account.

","name":"follower_count","sample":"1000","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"riYyaii"}]},{"description":"

Social media account list of this affiliate.

","name":"social_medias","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"azjcGNM","children":[{"description":"

The platform of this social media account. 

","name":"platform","sample":"shopee live","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dEsiQJ"},{"description":"

The follower count of this account.

","name":"follower_count","sample":"1000","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"jfezYza"},{"description":"

Social media name of this account.

","name":"social_media_user_name","sample":"aads","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bizWHEc"}]},{"description":"

Number of clicks in the last 30 days.

","name":"total_click","sample":"10000","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"rMmraBW"},{"description":"

Range number of the orders in the last 30 days.

","name":"order_range","sample":"[200,400]","type":"int64[]","required":null,"key":"bashncs"},{"description":"

Range number of the gmv in the last 30 days.

","name":"gmv_range","sample":"[1000000000000,5000000000000]","type":"int64[]","required":null,"key":"jSDXMWb"},{"description":"

Golden tick means affiliates create high quality contents with good sales conversion in Shopee Live or Shopee Video.

","name":"is_orange_tick_kol","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"pnWFrTJ"},{"description":"

Good sample fulfillment means that affiliates demonstrate better in free sample fulfillment compared to the majority of affiliates in recent180 days.

","name":"is_good_fulfillment","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"dnXXsjQ"},{"description":"

Top three promote category ids for this affiliate

","name":"promote_category_ids","sample":"[100013,100644,100010]","type":"int64[]","required":null,"key":"DrRFeiw"},{"description":"

Top popular contents of this affiliate.

","name":"top_popular_contents","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"dxyFHyP","children":[{"description":"

The platform of this affiliate's content. eg. shopee video/shopee live

","name":"platform","sample":"shopee live","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SWmRpM"},{"description":"

The comment count of this affiliate's content.

","name":"comment_count","sample":"100","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tZQNkyH"},{"description":"

The like count of this affiliate's content.

","name":"like_count","sample":"300","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"dyWREGi"},{"description":"

The view count of this affiliate's content.

","name":"view_count","sample":"1000","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"HpbPFHC"},{"description":"

The cover link of this affiliate's content.

","name":"cover_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WJxsDfm"},{"description":"

The media link of this affiliate's content.

","name":"media_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MtzccSk"}]},{"description":"

Top selling items of the affiliate.

","name":"top_selling_products","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"faWJGw","children":[{"description":"

The item id of this item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"12345678","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"HWjJcbC"}]}]}]}]}
